actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain areas in applying the purchase price requirements applicable to mortgage revenue bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require modification of the purchase price limits under the mortgage revenue bond program to reflect housing costs in Westchester County, New York.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain areas in applying the purchase price requirements applicable to mortgage revenue bonds.
